name: Firefox ZDark Theme 0.98h ─ Horizontal Tabs
description:
Dark Minimal styled Firefox theme. 

A vertical tab version can be found here, but requires additional third-party add-ons.

https://userstyles.org/styles/140837/firefox-zdark-theme-0-97v-vertical-tabs

This theme is optimized for use with Firefox 52.0b9, after that, Mozilla did the WebExtensions update, which breaks just about every add-on on the market, including Stylish.
